company_info.name: Eicher Motors Limited
company_info.business_summary: Eicher Motors Limited, an automobile company, engages in the manufacture and sale of motorcycles and commercial vehicles in India and internationally. The company designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and sells two-wheelers; motorcycle accessories; and apparel, such as protective riding apparel, urban casual wear, and riding accessories for men and women. It owns the Royal Enfield motorcycle brand that offers Classic 350, Bullet 350, Meteor 350, Hunter 350, Himalayan 450, Scram 411, Interceptor 650, Continental GT 650, Super Meteor 650, Shotgun 650, and Thunderbird models. The company also offers through its joint venture, Volvo Eicher Commercial Vehicles Limited, manufactures and sells light and medium duty trucks, heavy duty trucks, and buses under the Eicher and Volvo brands; and connected vehicles under Eicher LIVE. In addition, it provides medium-duty base engines, engineering components, and aggregates. The company was founded in 1901 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.
